authors.name: taylor.panczyk
authors.note: this protocol was created and is implemented by the Surmeier team

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"59kr1","text":"In mice, specifically in Ndufs2fl/fl mice, weight gain usually stops above 70 days post injecton with the TH-Cre AAV into SNc. From that point, food supplements should be provided once daily via a gavage of 0.4-0.5 mL Ensure (Ensure original; 9gr protein,220 calories and we use Plastic feeding Tubes 22gax25mm FTP-22-25n from INSTECH mfg 2021-08-17; www.instechlabs.com) as long as mice keep gaining weight. When the second stop of weight gain happens, another daily gavage and 1 mL of subcutaneous saline should be added as necessary care.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"2f738","text":"- Plastic feeding Tubes 22gax25mm FTP-22-25n from INSTECH mfg 2021-08-17","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nu4h","text":"- Ensure (Ensure original; 9gr protein,220 calories)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2a1kc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dpr9l","text":" Once the animals are ready we look to put the feeding tube behind its tongue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"91b9k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7tcgi","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8v74g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"8A72BE402C9C11EEB4C5931E67331F7D","height":328,"id":393035,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2023-07-27 at 9.42.04 AM.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/m94pbxuz7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/m94mbxuz7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/m94nbxuz7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/m94kbxuz7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6q9iq","text":"Once there, we place the feeding tube parallel to the animal with a light hyperextension, in this manner the feeding tube will get into the stomach with no effort**","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2c314","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1b1qv","text":"*With this detail we will be avoiding all complicaBon for gavage that can happen acute or\nchronic.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4aoue","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7t19f","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A1BB48B02C9C11EEB4C5931E67331F7D","height":514,"id":393039,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screenshot 2023-07-27 at 9.42.40 AM.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/m94tbxuz7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/m94rbxuz7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/m94sbxuz7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/m94qbxuz7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"csfhc","text":"Slide the feeding tube in to the stomach and administer solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17sp2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17g7f","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"802ab","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E90540E02C9C11EEB4C5931E67331F7D","height":514.0999999999999,"id":393043,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/m94xbxuz7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/m94vbxuz7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/m94wbxuz7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/m94ubxuz7.webp","width":467.36363636363654}}}}
